perturbation.original_text: 4.2.3 MediWound shall make payment for each Bromelain SP batch that was supplied by CBC on a [***] days basis as of the date of delivery of the applicable batch at MediWound, provided that MediWound has provided CBC with an Acceptance Batch Notice for such purchased batch pursuant to Section 6.4. Payment for each purchase batch shall be effected by MediWound by swift to a bank account designated by CBC, or by other requested method as agreed between the parties. MediWound shall make down payment of USD[***]/kg for the [***]% of the amount of Annual Forecast before Dec.31 of the respective year for the insurance of components and materials and maintenance of manufacture and supply capacity of the requested [***]% of the next calendar year's Annual Forecast. The down payment will be then deducted respectively as every shipment is made to MediWound and listed in CBC's Invoice to MediWound.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.2.3 MediWound shall make payment for each Bromelain SP batch that was supplied by CBC on a [***] days basis as of the date of delivery of the applicable batch at MediWound, provided that MediWound has provided CBC with an Acceptance Batch Notice for such purchased batch pursuant to Section 6.4. Payment for each purchase batch shall be effected by MediWound by swift to a bank account designated by CBC, or by other requested method as agreed between the parties. Notwithstanding the previous payment term, MediWound is granted the option to defer payment up to 120 days from the date of delivery without incurring any late payment fees or penalties. MediWound shall make down payment of USD[***]/kg for the [***]% of the amount of Annual Forecast before Dec.31 of the respective year for the insurance of components and materials and maintenance of manufacture and supply capacity of the requested [***]% of the next calendar year's Annual Forecast. The down payment will be then deducted respectively as every shipment is made to MediWound and listed in CBC's Invoice to MediWound.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the payment terms. The original clause states payment shall be made on a specific '[***] days basis,' while the added sentence grants MediWound the option to defer payment up to 120 days without penalty. This creates uncertainty about the actual payment deadline, making enforcement ambiguous.

perturbation.original_text:
6.4 Prior to delivery of each batch of Bromelain SP, CBC shall submit a batch sample to MediWound for inspection and approval. MediWound shall have the right, for a period of [***] days following receipt, to reject any Bromelain SP sample which:

6.4.1 fails to comply with MediWound's purchase order; or

6.4.2 fails to comply with the sample incoming inspection Specifications.

Within the said [***] days, MediWound shall notify CBC of either: (i) its approval and acceptance of such batch sample ("Acceptance Sample Notice"); or (ii) its rejection of the batch sample in which case MediWound shall detail the reason(s) for the rejection of any such Bromelain SP sample. In the event of rejection by MediWound, CBC shall deliver complying Bromelain SP sample to MediWound within [***] days of rejection, free of cost (including transportation, duty, handling and insurance costs). For clarification purposes, MediWound's Acceptance Sample Notice in accordance with this section above shall in no event derogate from CBC's responsibilities hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text:
6.4 Prior to delivery of each batch of Bromelain SP, CBC shall submit a batch sample to MediWound for inspection and approval. MediWound shall have the right, for a period of [***] days following receipt, to reject any Bromelain SP sample which:

6.4.1 fails to comply with MediWound's purchase order; or

6.4.2 fails to comply with the sample incoming inspection Specifications.

Within the said [***] days, MediWound shall notify CBC of either: (i) its approval and acceptance of such batch sample ("Acceptance Sample Notice"); or (ii) its rejection of the batch sample in which case MediWound shall detail the reason(s) for the rejection of any such Bromelain SP sample. Notwithstanding the above inspection period, MediWound shall be deemed to have accepted the sample if it does not provide a rejection notice within 15 days of receipt. In the event of rejection by MediWound, CBC shall deliver complying Bromelain SP sample to MediWound within [***] days of rejection, free of cost (including transportation, duty, handling and insurance costs). For clarification purposes, MediWound's Acceptance Sample Notice in accordance with this section above shall in no event derogate from CBC's responsibilities hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause allows MediWound '[***]' days to inspect and approve or reject the Bromelain SP sample. The added sentence introduces a conflicting term by stating that if MediWound doesn't provide a rejection notice within 15 days, the sample is deemed accepted, regardless of the original inspection period. This creates a contradiction about the actual timeframe allowed for inspection and acceptance, making it uncertain which term governs.

perturbation.original_text: 10.1 MediWound may terminate this Agreement at any time, by 6 (six) months prior notice in writing.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.1 MediWound may terminate this Agreement at any time, by 6 (six) months prior notice in writing. However, in the event that MediWound terminates the contract before the fifth year, it will be subject to early termination fees, as defined in section 10.4.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause allows MediWound to terminate the agreement at any time with 6 months' notice. The added text introduces a condition that early termination fees apply if the contract is ended before the fifth year, creating a contradiction about MediWound's termination rights. This creates uncertainty about whether MediWound can freely terminate the agreement and if so, under what financial conditions.
